about_the_game:
Strange creatures have infested our planet. Round 'em up by seducing them with other creatures, and rid the world of this outbreak!




A turn-based RPG focusing on sleuthing. You have to figure out what your opponent is into by studying how much your sex positions are affecting them. Make 'em cum!

Features


  • 2 to 3 hour campaign
  • Over 100 unique animations
  • One-handed control scheme - and customizable controls
  • Detailed manual and bestiary
  • Movable camera during scenes
  • Charming art style - creature models by Hans Woofington
  • Kickass music - tunes by slowfreq

Note: your save file from the demo WILL transfer to the full game!
